de.cellular.lib.lightlib.ui.view.gallery
Class LLAsyncGallery

java.lang.Object
  Handler
      de.cellular.lib.lightlib.backend.base.LLRequestResponsibleObject
          de.cellular.lib.lightlib.ui.view.gallery.LLAsyncGallery
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.cellular.lib.lightlib.backend.base.ILLRequestResponsible, ILLGallery
public class LLAsyncGallery
extends de.cellular.lib.lightlib.backend.base.LLRequestResponsibleObject
implements ILLGallery

Decorator for LLGallery that user can pass an array of URLs and the Gallery shows all items asynchronized.

Version:
1.0.1
  • Added comments.

    • Because a comment of a bitmap must be shown later(All bitmaps are loaded async in #load(RequestedSize)). Here I introduce LLAsyncGallery.CommentHelper to store comments that are loaded later
    and change Queue to List that stored Uris, so that the LLAsyncGallery can get a correct comment for a loaded bitmap with an index.

    Author:
    Chris Xinyue Zhao
    See Also:
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decorator_pattern}

    To know more about the Decorator pattern from GOF., #appendBitmapFromMessage(Message), knows that how a comment links to the correct bitmap.

    1.0

  • just a beginning
